sen.j: 京都・妙法院蓮華王院本堂（三十三間堂）本尊の千手観音の巨像は、銘文から、湛慶最晩年の82歳の時に完成したことが知られる。
sen.e: It is known that Tankei completed a big statue of the Senju Kannon (Sahasrabhuja-arya-avalokiteśvara or the Thousand Armed Kannon), the principal image at the Myoho-in Temple, Rengeo-in (Sanjusangen-do) in Kyoto at the age of 82 in his later years according to the inscription on the monument.

sen.e: Among the 1,000 statues (more precisely 1,001 statues) standing together in large numbers on either side of the principal image at Sanjusangen-do, some statues have an inscription saying the statue was made by Tankei.
